definition: (of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
dose of medicine to be taken in solution/infusion

sentences.english: Wine Granules, sediment muscles swelling, immediate pain relief, not as sore.
sentences.chinese: 用酒沖服，將渣子敷於腫處，可立即止痛，不再成瘡。

sentences.english: He sniffed the apples and smelled nothing .
sentences.chinese: 他把鼻子湊到蘋果沖服嗅了嗅。

sentences.english: Biwensan can also be taken with water.
sentences.chinese: 避溫散也可以用水沖服。

sentences.english: The preparation is orally taten and has less or no bitter.
sentences.chinese: 製劑口服或者加水沖服，苦感減少或無苦味。

definition: to mash/to beat to a pulp
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
radish seed (used in TCM to treat indigestion)
to dry over a fire/to roast
poor man's ginseng (Codonopsis pilosula)/codonopsis root (used in TCM)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
